headline: Did Record Quarterly Sales and Global Expansion Just Shift Monster Beverage's (MNST) Investment Narrative?
summary: Monster Beverage Corporation reported record third-quarter 2025 results, with net sales rising to US$2.20 billion and net income reaching US$524.46 million, significantly outperforming the prior year. International sales accounted for 43% of total net sales, the highest ever for a single quarter, highlighting the company's successful efforts to expand globally and diversify revenue streams. We'll explore how Monster Beverage's record global sales and strong international performance...

headline: Monster Beverage (MNST): Evaluating Fair Value After Strong Shareholder Returns and Recent Price Rally
summary: Monster Beverage (MNST) continues to draw interest among investors as its stock moves steadily upward over the past month, supported by consistent revenue and net income growth. The steady performance keeps it in focus for growth investors. See our latest analysis for Monster Beverage. Monster Beverage’s share price keeps powering higher, rallying over 5% in the last day and up more than 33% year-to-date, which puts it well ahead of most peers. That momentum has helped deliver a 28.8% total...
